Client

Forte is a video streaming platform that offers its users live and on-demand boutique fitness classes from top studios worldwide. 

Objective

  1. Rescue the video streaming platform after the company unexpectedly lost its entire engineering team along with CTO. 
  2. Transform the platform from a classic marketplace website to a SaaS ecosystem.

Solution

Using their expertise, the Achievion team was able to quickly pick up where the former tech team left off. They were able to get platform up and running within several days. The team built a scalable SaaS infrastructure and enhanced the platform with the following features:

  • Class leaderboard to allow users compete with each other in real-time 
  • 2-way video capability to enable class participants communicate in a Zoom-like way 
  • Connectivity with top wearable devices (Apple Watch, FitBit, Garmin, Samsung Watch, MyZone) for instant workout performance feedback
  • White-label module to deliver custom web and mobile Forte applications to the clients 
  • Integration with multiple club management software vendors such as MindBody, MarianaTek, ABC Fitness and Daxco to ensure smooth integration between the white-label SaaS system and existing studio websites
  • iOS and Android apps

Result

The team became a trusted partner to Forte and built a scalable SaaS infrastructure serving top fitness chains across US and abroad.
